channel.title: Comments on: Bali by bike part three: a Slippery Slope

item.title: By: Will Sanders
item.dc:creator: Will Sanders
item.description: Thanks, I will remember that when I am there. I actually thought that went for all of Indonesia.
item.content:encoded: Thanks, I will remember that when I am there. I actually thought that went for all of Indonesia.

item.title: By: Quentin Lenk
item.dc:creator: Quentin Lenk
item.description: When in Bali, never use your left hand when giving or receiving objects, and this is considered taboo; do not beckon people with your finger that is very rude.
item.content:encoded: When in Bali, never use your left hand when giving or receiving objects, and this is considered taboo; do not beckon people with your finger that is very rude.

item.title: By: Marcus Rosentrater
item.dc:creator: Marcus Rosentrater
item.description: That seems like a beer commercial. In fact, if you return to the states lets pitch an idea to the suits about a serious of commercials that focus on how you travel all this way through difficult terrain just to drink a beer on Idul Fitri.
item.content:encoded: That seems like a beer commercial. In fact, if you return to the states lets pitch an idea to the suits about a serious of commercials that focus on how you travel all this way through difficult terrain just to drink a beer on Idul Fitri.

item.title: By: amy bugg burke
item.dc:creator: amy bugg burke
item.description: Sounds like a horrible day, although I bet you will look back on it like you have with all of your adventures and smile. That's so nice that they went through so much trouble to bring you a beer!
item.content:encoded: Sounds like a horrible day, although I bet you will look back on it like you have with all of your adventures and smile. That’s so nice that they went through so much trouble to bring you a beer!
